snippet: Azerbaijan and Armenia on Monday both reported more losses in a sharp escalation of fighting over the disputed territory of Nagorno-Karabakh, with 18 soldiers now confirmed dead.
abstract: Sharp escalation of fighting over disputed territory of Nagorno-Karabakh leads Azerbaijan and Armenia to both report more losses; 18 soldiers are now confirmed dead.
lead_paragraph: Azerbaijan and Armenia on Monday both reported more losses in a sharp escalation of fighting over the disputed territory of Nagorno-Karabakh, with 18 soldiers now confirmed dead.
